column4: Hi, completely new to ubintu and I s?hall download an iso for installation on my PC. Shall I use ubuntu-6.06-alternate-i386.iso  or ubuntu-6.06-desktop-i386.iso?
if you want to be completely safe, I recommend the alternate text-based one.

the one marked "desktop" is a live cd and contains a graphical installer that is known to erase certain NTFS partitions on some arrangements. The one marked "alternate" is not a live cd and is only an installer but does not have aforementioned issue.
yeah in that case you definitely want the one marked "alternate"
